name: Fall Tales
description:
A brief visual novel made for a no-crunch gamejam!

To fit the no-crunch style of the jam, the game is more a story than it is truly a game. You will be peeking into the history of the jack-o-lantern, and learn a thing or two about (trying to) outwitting the devil.

Lead+Visual artist: Doctor Pumpkins
https://twitter.com/drpumpkins

Writer+Editor: Ruby
https://twitter.com/ruby_bat

Composer: Lemmy
https://twitter.com/BJames187
